post.body: jealous of your spa day, btw!
mine did that until I updated again, then it showed the 550 something... :-)
can't we all? :-)
no no, why would I do THAT when I am often the one coming home to a fully prepared, lovely, meal??? I'm no dummy, married a foodie.
**blink** **blink** uh ...
yup, totally know that feeling... :-)
uh huh **deadpan stare**
yay, recovery ride!
it'll still be Wed. and Thurs, but it looks like only AMs for class - unsure about Wed. Had a lab last quarter (and Thurs late)
Funny.... well, I hope everything is okay!
Wow, be sure to post and let us know if you lose power ;-P
what disjointed and scatterbrained? :-P
Bah, today I got the cold, grey ride, and hubby got the sunny, gorgeous ride. You win some, you lose some. ;-)
nothing like tantrums in two out of three kids before 9AM...
"though we adore men individually, we agree that as a group they're rather stupid... Well done! Sister suffragette!" (Mary Poppins)
3 y.o. jokes: "knock-knock" "who's there?" "Mrs. Apple" "Mrs. Apple who?" BWA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA **hysterical laughter for many minutes**
Grrrr..... walked with three kids a few miles to try to take back the big girl's rental flute, and the music store was closed....
should add, should be much better for my use of TIME... Have quals exams to prepare for.
Checked out my upcoming class schedule - only slightly better than this last quarter, but not homeschooling my kid, should be MUCH better.
Costco on the Monday after Xmas, deserted... a week ago you couldn't get a parking space, or move in the warehouse.
